title: python-几行代码简单海龟绘图
comments: 成了，代码如下：import turtle as ttfrom random import randinttt.TurtleScreen._RUNNING = Truett.speed(0)tt.bgcolor(black)tt.setpos(-25, 25)tt.colormode(255)cnt = 0while cnt  500:    r = randint(0, 255)    g = randint(0, 255)    b = randint(0, 255)    tt.pencolor(r, g, b)    tt.forward(50 + cnt)    tt.right(91)    cnt += 1tt.done()
这个库是专门的图像处理库吗?还没学过唉
black处有单引号，500前面有小于号
